articles.content: Payal Rohatgi recently took dig at Kangana Ranaut as she criticised the box officer performance of her recent release Dhaakad. She wrote, SadKarma is a b****.Jisko 18 lakh vote mile na usne film ki p… [+280 chars]

articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Kareena Kapoor checks into Darjeeling hotel with son Jeh, gets a warm welcome - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Kareena Kapoor and son Jehangir Ali Khan were seen entering a hotel in Darjeeling in a new video from ongoing shoot for her Netflix debut, The Devotion of Suspect X.
articles.content: Kareena Kapoor is slated to make her Netflix debut in The Devotion of Suspect X. The actor is filming the Sujoy Ghosh-helmed project in Darjeeling. On Monday, a new video of the actor, her younger so… [+1950 chars]

articles.author: Krishna Priya Pallavi
articles.title: Disha Parmar in maxi dress and a trendy monokini slays holiday fashion goals - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Disha Parmar slipped into two trendy looks - a white maxi dress worth ₹5k and a monokini - for chilling at the beach during her holiday in the Maldives. The Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2 actor nailed holiday fashion goals in the ensembles.

articles.title: The Archies: Suhana Khan, Khushi Kapoor And Agastya Nanda Happily Pose In This Unseen Pic From Their Dance Rehearsals - NDTV
articles.description: Choreographer Caesar Gonsalves has shared a video on his Instagram wishing Suhana Khan on her birthday
articles.content:
Caesar shared a post with Suhana, Khushi and Agastya. (courtesy: caesar2373)

articles.title: Major Previews Across Nation, Before Theatrical Release.. - Greatandhra
articles.description: Adivi Sesh's Pan India film Major will have its theatrical release worldwide on June 3rd in three languages.
articles.content:
Adivi Sesh’s Pan India film Major will have its theatrical release worldwide on June 3rd in three languages.

articles.title: Amul pays heartfelt tribute to Soumitra Chatterjee and Swatilekha Sengupta as their film Belashuru releases - India Today
articles.description: Dairy brand Amul paid a heartfelt tribute to late actors Soumitra Chatterjee and Swatilekha Sengupta as their film Belashuru released in the theatre last week.

articles.author: IndiaGlitz
articles.title: After Suriya, yet another celebrity joins the cast of Vikram - Deets inside - Tamil News - Telugu Cinema - IndiaGlitz
articles.description: Ulaganayagan's Vikram directed by young director Lokesh Kanagaraj of Kaithi fame is doing the buzz all over India and also at the Cannes films Festival.
